name: Advanced Custom Fields: Multisite Sync
author: Philipp KÃ¼hn

sections.description:
What does it do?

This plugin does nothing else than to use the internal export function of ACF to filter the data from your main page. After that all fieldgroups of your subpage will be deleted and re-imported. So it’s more of a hack than a real sync.

This has the consequence that the ID integer of your posts shoots pretty in height with frequent use. But that doesn’t really matter I think.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire acf-multisite-sync folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.

short_description: Sync your Advanced Custom Fields to all of your multisite installations with just one click. Needs ACF Pro 5.0+
description:
What does it do?

This plugin does nothing else than to use the internal export function of ACF to filter the data from your main page. After that all fieldgroups of your subpage will be deleted and re-imported. So it’s more of a hack than a real sync.

This has the consequence that the ID integer of your posts shoots pretty in height with frequent use. But that doesn’t really matter I think.
